---
title: "us_block_groups creation"
---

```{r read_in_fips_data}
blk_grp_raw <-
  read.csv("https://www2.census.gov/geo/docs/reference/cenpop2010/blkgrp/CenPop2010_Mean_BG.txt",
           sep = ",", header = TRUE, colClasses = "character")

head(blk_grp_raw)
```

```{r pare_down_to_fips_codes_only}
# Pares down to only the fips code data
blk_grp1 <- blk_grp_raw %>%
  dplyr::select(STATEFP, COUNTYFP, TRACTCE, BLKGRPCE)

head(blk_grp1)
```

```{r create_integer_vector_of_block_group_GEOIDs}
us_block_groups <- as.numeric(paste0(blk_grp1$STATEFP, blk_grp1$COUNTYFP,
                                     blk_grp1$TRACTCE, blk_grp1$BLKGRPCE))
```

```{r save_us_block_groups}
devtools::use_data(us_block_groups, internal = FALSE, overwrite = TRUE)
```
